title: Visual Bug in Super Galaxy Kindred skin!
body: I dont know why but more or less at minute 20, with 5 passive stack, the auto attacks of kindred where again the Classic Skins ones, i mean it was all the skin theme but the autos where like the classic ones, it happen already like in 3 games, its way so disappointing since at least for me the autos of the skin are gorgeus, and ofc, i paid for the skin ( in posterior games i appreciate is indeed when i reach 5 passive stacks)

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! This issue has been resolved, and you should see the proper effects playing with the next patch (6.11). ^-^

Hello ^^ in the same context of the super galaxy kindred please my wolf is mooving so weird it's like he was moving stoping moving stoping again ... like 3 or 4 times per seconds and cant turn correctly + when i use the w he seems not natural at fisrt he stands in the middle of the zone and then he kinda like teleports directly on the target

Hi hi! 

Wolf should be moving like he does on the base and all other skins. I'm able to recreate the spawn issue - it's not as smooth as Shadowfire or the base. As far as the movement, that's something I'm not able to recreate. Would you happen to have a video of that? Thanks!
